item.description:
Hi -

Let's have lunch at one of my favorite Mid-Coast restaurants!  Here is the link to their menu and the directions:

http://muddy-rudder.com/

Great menu - seafood and other items, as well as a gluten-free menu.  Now that summer is over, it will be a lot easier getting into the area restaurants!

Look for my silver Subaru Forester in the parking lot until just before 11:30; after that, ask for Randy's group once inside.

 

Restaurant Meetup Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for silver Subaru Forester in parking lot. After 11:30, ask for Randy's table.
item.name: Lunch at Muddy Rudder!
